2023.title: Service Workers & PWAs
2023.description: Progressive Web Apps and service workers for reliable, offline-capable web experiences with background sync and push notifications.

2023.title: React Server Components
2023.description: Server-rendered components that allow sending less JavaScript to the client and improve initial load performance.

2023.title: Tailwind CSS
2023.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs without leaving your HTML.

2023.title: WebAssembly (Wasm)
2023.description: High-performance binary format enabling languages like Rust, C, and Go to run in the browser for compute-intensive tasks.

2023.title: HTTP/3 & QUIC
2023.description: Faster, more reliable transport with built-in multiplexing and reduced latency compared to HTTP/2.
